i:field.name: title
i:field.label: Report Title
i:field.i:comment: This is title of the report. It appears on the cover page as well as in all the page headers.

i:field.name: intro
i:field.label: Report Intro
i:field.i:comment: This is a general description of the report will be placed on a separate page as formatted text. Please provide it as plain text or use our XML tags for text formatting.

i:field.name: description
i:field.label: Template Description
i:field.i:comment: A short description of the report. This will not be displayed in the generated files, it is for your own records only. Please provide this as plain text.

i:field.name: timezones_id
i:field.label: Time Zone
i:field.i:comment: The timezone which the data output should rendered as.

i:field.name: asset_list
i:field.label: Listing Type
i:field.i:comment: This is how the servers in the report will be listed.
